tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: #FSI's @HistoryatState Director Adam Howard hosted a virtual meeting with the US Army Center of Military History’s Graduate…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: #FSI's @HistoryAtState Director Adam Howard hosted a virtual meeting with the US Army Center of Military History’s Graduate Research Assistants and interns to discuss the Foreign Relations of the United States (FRUS) series. Learn more about #FRUS here: bit.ly/2IZuF13.
